programme.title: Gumnaam The Mystery
programme.desc: An aspiring actress, Ria who models and acts in music videos is offered a lead role in a film by casting director Rishi Gandhi. However, when she arrives at the director's mansion, she begins to realise that things are not as they seem.

programme.title: Kiss Kis Ko
programme.desc: A group of young Indian men calling themselves Band of Boys decide to perform publicly, to share their talents India-wide, as well as to make a career for themselves. It seems the public is only interested seeing a group of girls perform.

programme.title: The Murderer
programme.desc: A hotel musician's life takes a turn for the unexpected after his admirer's presumed suicide. Considered a prime suspect himself, he does some investigation and comes to realize that the case is far more twisted than it appeared.

programme.title: Gumnaam The Mystery
programme.desc: An aspiring actress, Ria who models and acts in music videos is offered a lead role in a film by casting director Rishi Gandhi. However, when she arrives at the director's mansion, she begins to realise that things are not as they seem.

programme.title: Ilaka (peddupettai)
programme.desc: Crime drama about Kumar, a man who rises from a slum to become a powerful figure in the underworld after witnessing his mother's murder. Driven by ambition and vengeance, he navigates betrayal and crime.

programme.title: Zameer The Fire Within
programme.desc: A spoiled brat gets married to her professor despite several challenges. Soon after, he learns that his wife was responsible for the separation of his ex-girlfriend and he leaves her, never to return.

programme.title: Anjaana Anjaaani
programme.desc: The film of two strangers, who meet on a bridge intending to commit suicide. After bonding over their shared miseries,they make a pact to live life to the fullest for the next 20 days and explore various adventures together. As they embark on this trip, they begin to develop feelings for each other, leading to a complex and emotional journey. Will they embrace their new-found love or stick to their original plan?

programme.title: Aashiq
programme.desc: Pooja and Chander fall in love and want to be together. However, since Pooja's alcoholic father would never approve, she decides to run away from her house but, unfortunately, lands in a brothel.

programme.title: Karobaar : The Business Of Love
programme.desc: Friends Rajiv and Amar go their separate ways after Seema decides to be with Amar rather than Rajiv. Years later, prosecution lawyer Amar is delighted to see Rajiv in court and accused of murder.

programme.title: Kabir Singh
programme.desc: An exalted but short-fused surgeon plunges into a spiral of drugs, alcohol and rage after his intense relationship with his girlfriend turbulently ends.

programme.title: Koi Aap Sa
programme.desc: A film that centers around a young man who develops feelings for his childhood friend, who is already in a committed relationship. As he tries to move on, he falls in love with another woman. However, things become complicated when his childhood friend realizes her own feelings for him.

programme.title: Agnee Prem
programme.desc: The film is a love story between a rich girl and middle class boy. The girls stepmother is against the alliance so they run away. they are helped by a lawyer. The girls father sends a hired killer to finish he boy but the killer is under the impression that the boy is characterless. He finds out the truth in time and then helps the lovers.

programme.title: Dil Aur Mohabbat
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, a policeman raises his son all by himself and expects the latter to be a good person. However, the policeman is left disappointed after the son grows up.

programme.title: Har Har Gange
programme.desc: Distraught after the death of his wife Sati (incarnation of Adishakti), Shiva isolates himself and becomes immersed in deep meditation. To restore order, Adishakti takes birth as Ganga and Uma.

programme.title: My Love
programme.desc: Raj, a man from a wealthy family, decides if he should marry the daughter of his father's best friend or follows the path of his true love.

programme.title: Dil Hai Betab
programme.desc: A middle-class girl falls in love with her college friend, and the couple wish to marry, then her father says that he has received a marriage proposal for her from a rich man that they cannot refuse.

programme.title: Yaraana
programme.desc: JB, a borderline psychopath, is attracted to Lalita, a beautiful, young woman. He forces her to marry him but she runs away on her wedding day by feigning unconsciousness.

programme.title: Tum Haseen Main Jawan
programme.desc: A navy officer who has had a number of affairs with attractive young women meets a beautiful girl and falls in love. Though she loves him in return, another admirer of hers tells the officer that she is deceiving him and is the mother of a child.

programme.title: Saagar
programme.desc: Raja secretly loves Mona, but she is in love with Ravi. However, Ravi's grandmother disapproves of their relationship and asks Mona to forget him and marry someone else.

programme.title: Badrinath Yatra
programme.desc: Devdutt's arrest derails Satyavati's pilgrimage. He succumbs to vices, neglecting his pregnant wife. Blinded by darkness, he invites Chandravati into their home, fracturing the family. Secrets unravel, leaving behind a trail of betrayal and destruction.

programme.title: Hema Malini Parveen Babi Hit Bollywood Divas
programme.desc: The Original Bollywood Divas! Hema's elegance + Parveen's sass = Unbeatable 70s magic. Press play for nostalgia in every note!

programme.title: Dance Hits
programme.desc: Pure nostalgia on the dance floor! Celebrate the vibrant sounds of old-school Hindi dance music with timeless beats and retro charm.

programme.title: Shahenshah Of Bollywood-83rd Birthday Special Vol 2
programme.desc: Iconic melodies of Amitabh Bachchan reflecting romance,pride, and cinematic brilliance.

programme.title: Zindagi Ka Safar
programme.desc: Dive into the emotions of life, with a collection of heartfelt songs that beautifully capture the highs and lows of life. Let these timeless tunes resonate with your emotions and experiences.

programme.title: Dilip Kumar – Tributes To A Legend
programme.desc: Celebrate the voice of a generation with songs immortalized by the charisma of Dilip Kumar. Soul-stirring ghazals, patriotic numbers, and emotional ballads that reflect a cinematic titan’s journey.

programme.title: Masti Bhare Geet
programme.desc: Feel-good songs to groove to. Perfect for boosting your mood and adding fun to any moment – pure, carefree energy!

programme.title: Blissful Beats
programme.desc: Soothing melodies that calm your soul. Let these peaceful tunes create your perfect moment of serenity. A carefully curated collection of rhythms to help you unwind.

programme.title: Disco Dancer
programme.desc: Bring back the flashy disco vibes with this sensational Disco Dancer jukebox. Whether you're a retro lover or a new-age dancer, these beats will keep you moving!

programme.title: Gane Naye Purane
programme.desc: Relive the golden era of music with classic melodies, retro rhythms, and timeless tunes that never fade. A nostalgic trip for true old-school lovers!

programme.title: Kumar Sanu Alka Yagnik
programme.desc: Fall in love all over again with Kumar Sanu & Alka Yagnik! Their magical duets—full of passion, heartbreak, and nostalgia—are pure 90s gold.

programme.title: R D Burman – Musical Maverick
programme.desc: A powerhouse collection of R.D. Burman's iconic hits, blending innovation, emotion, and energy. From soulful ballads to electrifying grooves, experience the genius of Pancham Da that defined Bollywood's golden soundscape.

programme.title: Best Of 70s – The Golden Era
programme.desc: Step into Bollywood’s most soulful decade with this jukebox of evergreen melodies. A rich tapestry of romance, innocence, and timeless charm – pure nostalgia from the golden 70s.

programme.title: Best Of 90s – Filmy Beats Reloaded
programme.desc: Take a ride through the vibrant 90s with peppy love anthems, dramatic duets, and emotional melodies. This jukebox celebrates the signature style of Bollywood's musical revival decade.

programme.title: Rajesh Khanna – The Superstar's Anthems
programme.desc: Revisit the unmatched charm of Rajesh Khanna with this jukebox of unforgettable melodies. Romantic, philosophical, and heartfelt – these songs defined an era and a superstar.

programme.title: Jeetendra Hits The Jumping Jack
programme.desc: Dive into Jeetendra’s iconic hits—The Jumping Jack’s timeless energy! Relive the magic of Bollywood’s golden era with foot-tapping beats, romance, and pure nostalgia!

programme.title: Neetu Singh Evergreen Hits
programme.desc: Turn up the retro vibes with Neetu Singh’s greatest hits! A birthday playlist packed with nostalgia, romance, and endless charm.

programme.desc: Starcast-Anita Devgan, Nirmal Rishi, Gurpreet Ghuggi, Karamjit Anmol, Mehtab Virk, Tanvi Nagi, Harby Sangha, Shivinder Mahal, Nisha Bano

programme.title: Cratch
programme.desc: When two individuals coming from two different parts of society with completely distinctive thought processes COLLIDE there would be Chaos, Confusion & a lot of disagreement, but would there ever be an eye-opening conversation? Watch this short to find out Kamrul's unique take on Life and how it affects Manay's perception towards it.

programme.title: Bhool
programme.desc: A young actor in dire straits assumes the identity of a retired Army Officer's son in real life to leverage his housing arrangement. The officer, battling memory loss, eventually uncovers the harsh reality about his long-lost son, prompting the actor to flee for his life.

programme.title: Best Friend
programme.desc: This story centers on Manav, a wealthy and aggressive man, who is deeply possessive of his girlfriend, Shreya. When Shreya, alone at home, invites Manav over for the first time, a misunderstanding between her and Manav's best friend leads Manav, in a fit of rage, to murder both Shreya and his guard.

programme.title: Ticket Please
programme.desc: Manohar Kadam, a voluntary retired man, tries hard to establish a meaningful connection with his only son Aditya but fails. Later he follows his friend Professor's advice and tries to connect with his son through a smartphone. The short film follows the Journey of Father and Son relationship in this Digital Era.

programme.title: Bena
programme.desc: After a set of jewelry goes missing, the police search Bena's bag. Her employers, Bhai and Bhabhi, are shocked to see the contents. They throw her out and Bena spends the day calling people for jobs. The family driver calls Bena and informs her that the set was found. Bena knew that the set would be found as it was misplaced not stolen. Next, she gets a call for a new job. Bena finds out that her employer Bhabhi had recommended Bena. Why was Bena thrown out of her job? What in the bag?

programme.title: Broken Stars
programme.desc: An astrologer who has a fake beard is just like his profession. He is confused about the stars and how it determines anyone's future, he tricks people daily but He is worried about his daughter suffering from a disease, then one day as it happens his past somehow connects with his present which determines his future. it is a philosophical journey of a man who constantly questions the existence of sheer weirdness of the whole connection of our stars with lives and his realization

programme.title: Bridge
programme.desc: Mukesh is a widower and has a 28-year-old so Rahul. They live together and rarely talk amicably with each other. Rahul thinks his father is too weird for his age whereas Mukesh thinks why Rahul constantly judges him for his choices.

programme.title: Chashmishq
programme.desc: A tale of two budding lovers, their glasses, and the unforeseen challenges that come between their first kiss.

programme.title: Bandage
programme.desc: A young-adult, aspiring boxer, Aditya, trains with his father to become the best. However, he starts questioning his ambition and skills to make it to the top. Battling with his own troubles, the father tries to motivate Aditya. Will the father-son duo emerge victoriously, or will they crumble down in the face of their adversities?

programme.title: Karjdar Bhola
programme.desc: In a small village, Bhola and Komal, a struggling couple, face financial hardships. Bhola, a simple laborer, and Komal, his smart and beautiful wife, are burdened by a loan from Seth ji, a corrupt man who harasses Komal. Bhola mistakenly believes Komal is involved with Seth ji, leading to a deep misunderstanding. Eventually, the truth comes to light, allowing them to overcome their challenges and find happiness together.

programme.title: Bharam
programme.desc: A Hindi drama short film about an executive visiting a house to give away a Mercedes won by a housewife in a lucky draw and the confusion that follows.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: We all have a fantastic life but we spoil it with our silly ideas of how to live it. This story is about how in trying to define a relationship, we actually end up confining it. One such definition is marriage and this is what is discussed in Cheers by two intimately close friends - one of whom is helping the other decide against a bad marriage that she has chosen to live with for some time now, thus stifling herself from all the happiness she is entitled to. While the intent of the friend seem questionable, the story is about why she trusts him more than anyone else with this issue that she is facing

programme.title: Beyond Failing
programme.desc: This film captures intricate nuances of student stress, competition the so called rat race, parent child relation and purposeless living vs. purposeful living.

programme.title: Bully
programme.desc: In This Psychological Thriller, A girl who is holding her brother hostage must confront the darker aspects of her life and come face to face with the truth.

programme.title: Calling Bell
programme.desc: A psychopath Biriyani Delivery boy barges into the house of a young lady and threatens to kill her. The story revolves around this confrontation between these two characters. The climax of the story turns out to be something very unexpected.

programme.title: Believer
programme.desc: The story revolves around a young man who is struggling with his career and has to face tough situations on the financial front. In a state of dejection/ despair he has a dialogue with his inner self. His negative self talks him into addictions and resorting to drugs or committin suicide (escapist attitude) He usually feels at home in the company of his negative self and seeks solace here. Yet somewhere he is dissatisfied and constantly looking for his positive self, whom he has only abandoned

programme.title: Barking Bruno
programme.desc: Barking Bruno sheds light on the reality of modern life, where we often prefer pets over parents, viewing them as burdens. Rohit, content with his dog Bruno, contrasts sharply with his treatment of his father, Mr. Mehra, who feels neglected. However, when Mr. Mehra meets Bruno, his life takes an unexpected turn, albeit temporarily

programme.title: Chaar Pandrah
programme.desc: A suspense film about a military guy meeting a Stanger at the bus stop who asks him to stay at his house for the night, as he has a wrong ticket and his house is very far. But he starts to have strange feeling about the strangers wife.

programme.title: Blowback
programme.desc: An anxious boy is confused if marijuana helps him with his issues. His quest to answer this dilemma leads him into a night full of corruption and deceit.

programme.title: Bindu
programme.desc: Bindu, a little school-going girl, and his older brother Gaurav live in the hilly regions where they barely make their day’s end meet. Gaurav works in the early shifts as a paperman, delivering news on his cycle, and finds time in between for Bindu to take her to school. A stitched-up overused shoe, an old ragged school bag, Bindu becomes the epitome of being a struggling unprivileged kid while Gaurav holds on to his pair of old sandals, the same pair of dress, and an old cycle.

programme.title: Black Coffee
programme.desc: Film director Tara uncovers her sister Vanya's betrayal in a relationship and decides to take dramatic action. In a jaw-dropping twist, Tara stages their deaths in a short film. The lines between fiction and reality blur as Tara invites her real sister for coffee after the shoot, leaving the audience questioning what is real.

programme.title: Bumbhaiyya
programme.desc: The movie shows that how a common man is affected by the inter-religious conflicts that happen and how in the end he understands the real truth.

programme.title: Certitude
programme.desc: This movie shows the story of Arjun, a smalltown boy from Dehradun who decides to move to Mumbai for his further studies. So in his new surroundings, he is unable to trust anyone until he finds someone whom he can finally rely on throughout his journey in Mumbai.

programme.title: Betu
programme.desc: Sparsh(12), or Betu, as his mother calls him, is a happy, mischievous boy, who hates milk, who is conscious about his hairstyle and who is too impatient to wait for the lunch hour to eat his best friends tiffin. Sparsh’s life changes when his best friend’s mother dies in an accident. That being his first direct exposure to death, it shakes him up. The unpredictability of life hits him and his mind inadvertently goes to his own mother, who he realizes is not immune from the fickle composition of life. The fear of separation takes away the nonchalance from his attitude and he is no longer the carefree boy he used to be. He starts observing and watching over his mother like a guardian. As he prepares to meet the reality, he is summoned at the destination where his fears lie.

programme.title: Bed Tea
programme.desc: Anything can Happen Over a Bed Tea. An unexpected tale of a Rainy Morning which asks a question on a long time going on the existence of hidden evil behavior in relationships.

programme.title: Blurred Lines
programme.desc: 24-year-old Apoorva is caught in a tangle of relationships when she has an epiphany that she is attracted to her best friend who has come to dress her up to meet prospective in laws.

programme.title: Chand Saanse
programme.desc: Here is a story of a woman, NAYAN, She is in the waiting room of a hospital where her father-in-law is admitted. In the waiting room she sees suffering of other people. It looks the waiting room is meant waiting for death. She meets an old man who has just lost his wife but he is not aware of it. He keeps on talking about his wife as if she is still alive. That makes NAYAN to ask a question. What is the difference between life and death? Knowing about it or being unaware about it?

programme.title: Bepar
programme.desc: A flourishing young Indian immigrant, happily married to a caring Pakistani husband, appears to lead a flawless life. However, the challenges of being in an interfaith marriage and adjusting to a foreign society might prove overwhelming.

programme.title: Beshak
programme.desc: Story of a couple where the wife couldn’t find the difference between dream and reality and doubt enters into the relationship!

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: "A young woman returns home after a prolonged absence, enjoying a warm bond with her mother but strained ties with her father. Reconnecting with a previously misjudged acquaintance, she faces revived conflicts with her mother. Tasked with overseeing tuition students, an unforeseen incident alters their lives permanently. Her homecoming: a blessing or a curse?"

programme.title: Blame Game
programme.desc: A woman sits alone on a beach, lost in thought, until a stranger joins her, sparking a conversation that reveals a story about love, relationships, and the bitterness they can sometimes bring. She describes a once-loving bond that, over time, turned painful, leaving lasting scars.

programme.title: Countless
programme.desc: A man who decides to spend the night with a woman ends up spending countless nights with the same woman at the same time. Could this be punctuality, love, lust, or something completely different?

programme.title: Choices
programme.desc: Ritesh and Yami are just a day away from their marriage, and ritesh makes a confession which may affect their upcoming relationship, or maybe not?

programme.title: Bhagwaan - The Faith
programme.desc: A final chance meeting with a mysterious old homeless man changes everything they’ve experienced that day. The story delves into how deep their faith truly is and how people worship gods. Some use faith and god as a means of solace while others as a crutch for a troubling life.

programme.title: Budhwaar
programme.desc: In this captivating story, a man residing in a village embarks on a journey to purchase a piece of land within his community, seeking assistance from the sarpanch. Despite his wife and the sarpanch's warnings against buying the land on Budhwaar (Wednesday) due to its inauspicious nature, the man disregards their concerns and proceeds with the purchase. Filled with joy, he begins digging the land with aspirations of cultivating vegetables. However, his enthusiasm is short-lived as he soon discovers the land's infertility. His dreams are shattered as the realization dawns upon him that he has fallen victim to a deceitful scheme. What he decides to do next is a must-see, making this story all the more intriguing.

programme.title: Bita Hua Pal
programme.desc: The film delves into the universal question of love and compatibility. It follows the journey of a woman named Mira, who, like many others, finds herself questioning the foundation of her relationship. As she navigates the ups and downs of her own love story, she reflects on the nature of love and the challenges of maintaining a lasting connection.

programme.title: Chashmadeed
programme.desc: A 60 YO woman lives with her entitled 30-year-old son and his wife. She is a doting mother to him, and like any mother, thinks of her son as ideal. One morning, she starts having a strange issue with her eyes, as her vision keeps getting blurred in erratic spasms, like a camera going out of focus and back. Upon the recommendation of her 23-year-old hip and woke neighbor, she sets out to visit an eye clinic by herself. The solution offered at this eye clinic more than clears her blurry vision.

programme.title: Charitra Varnan
programme.desc: A cab driver comes across a woman standing and crying along the roadside. He tries to help her and tells her that he would drop her home safely. What happens next will leave you stunned.

programme.title: Cheater
programme.desc: Love is blind, they say. And, sometimes, quite literally! How many of us are guilty of forgiving our partners once too often for their hurtful actions? When it comes to a cheating spouse, however, you would think there was no scope for forgiveness.

programme.title: Cratch
programme.desc: When two individuals coming from two different parts of society with completely distinctive thought processes COLLIDE there would be Chaos, Confusion & a lot of disagreement, but would there ever be an eye-opening conversation? Watch this short to find out Kamrul's unique take on Life and how it affects Manay's perception towards it.

programme.title: Best Friend
programme.desc: This story centers on Manav, a wealthy and aggressive man, who is deeply possessive of his girlfriend, Shreya. When Shreya, alone at home, invites Manav over for the first time, a misunderstanding between her and Manav's best friend leads Manav, in a fit of rage, to murder both Shreya and his guard.

programme.title: Bena
programme.desc: After a set of jewelry goes missing, the police search Bena's bag. Her employers, Bhai and Bhabhi, are shocked to see the contents. They throw her out and Bena spends the day calling people for jobs. The family driver calls Bena and informs her that the set was found. Bena knew that the set would be found as it was misplaced not stolen. Next, she gets a call for a new job. Bena finds out that her employer Bhabhi had recommended Bena. Why was Bena thrown out of her job? What in the bag?

programme.title: Bridge
programme.desc: Mukesh is a widower and has a 28-year-old so Rahul. They live together and rarely talk amicably with each other. Rahul thinks his father is too weird for his age whereas Mukesh thinks why Rahul constantly judges him for his choices.

programme.title: Chashmishq
programme.desc: A tale of two budding lovers, their glasses, and the unforeseen challenges that come between their first kiss.

programme.title: Karjdar Bhola
programme.desc: In a small village, Bhola and Komal, a struggling couple, face financial hardships. Bhola, a simple laborer, and Komal, his smart and beautiful wife, are burdened by a loan from Seth ji, a corrupt man who harasses Komal. Bhola mistakenly believes Komal is involved with Seth ji, leading to a deep misunderstanding. Eventually, the truth comes to light, allowing them to overcome their challenges and find happiness together.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: We all have a fantastic life but we spoil it with our silly ideas of how to live it. This story is about how in trying to define a relationship, we actually end up confining it. One such definition is marriage and this is what is discussed in Cheers by two intimately close friends - one of whom is helping the other decide against a bad marriage that she has chosen to live with for some time now, thus stifling herself from all the happiness she is entitled to. While the intent of the friend seem questionable, the story is about why she trusts him more than anyone else with this issue that she is facing

programme.title: Bully
programme.desc: In This Psychological Thriller, A girl who is holding her brother hostage must confront the darker aspects of her life and come face to face with the truth.

programme.title: Believer
programme.desc: The story revolves around a young man who is struggling with his career and has to face tough situations on the financial front. In a state of dejection/ despair he has a dialogue with his inner self. His negative self talks him into addictions and resorting to drugs or committin suicide (escapist attitude) He usually feels at home in the company of his negative self and seeks solace here. Yet somewhere he is dissatisfied and constantly looking for his positive self, whom he has only abandoned

programme.title: Bhool
programme.desc: A young actor in dire straits assumes the identity of a retired Army Officer's son in real life to leverage his housing arrangement. The officer, battling memory loss, eventually uncovers the harsh reality about his long-lost son, prompting the actor to flee for his life.

programme.title: Ticket Please
programme.desc: Manohar Kadam, a voluntary retired man, tries hard to establish a meaningful connection with his only son Aditya but fails. Later he follows his friend Professor's advice and tries to connect with his son through a smartphone. The short film follows the Journey of Father and Son relationship in this Digital Era.

programme.title: Broken Stars
programme.desc: An astrologer who has a fake beard is just like his profession. He is confused about the stars and how it determines anyone's future, he tricks people daily but He is worried about his daughter suffering from a disease, then one day as it happens his past somehow connects with his present which determines his future. it is a philosophical journey of a man who constantly questions the existence of sheer weirdness of the whole connection of our stars with lives and his realization

programme.title: Bandage
programme.desc: A young-adult, aspiring boxer, Aditya, trains with his father to become the best. However, he starts questioning his ambition and skills to make it to the top. Battling with his own troubles, the father tries to motivate Aditya. Will the father-son duo emerge victoriously, or will they crumble down in the face of their adversities?

programme.title: Bharam
programme.desc: A Hindi drama short film about an executive visiting a house to give away a Mercedes won by a housewife in a lucky draw and the confusion that follows.

programme.title: Beyond Failing
programme.desc: This film captures intricate nuances of student stress, competition the so called rat race, parent child relation and purposeless living vs. purposeful living.

programme.title: Calling Bell
programme.desc: A psychopath Biriyani Delivery boy barges into the house of a young lady and threatens to kill her. The story revolves around this confrontation between these two characters. The climax of the story turns out to be something very unexpected.

programme.title: Barking Bruno
programme.desc: Barking Bruno sheds light on the reality of modern life, where we often prefer pets over parents, viewing them as burdens. Rohit, content with his dog Bruno, contrasts sharply with his treatment of his father, Mr. Mehra, who feels neglected. However, when Mr. Mehra meets Bruno, his life takes an unexpected turn, albeit temporarily

programme.title: Dwand
programme.desc: Ruby, a lower-middle-class girl was made to believe that she is beautiful, intelligent, and different and that she deserves a worthy husband. She completed her studies and wanted to be a career girl. However, the marriage happened contrary to her expectations with a traditional man Vivek of the similar lower middle-class strata. After giving birth to a girl child she revolted and joined an advertising company to shape up her career. Here begins the nightmare.

programme.title: Faboo
programme.desc: Are we using social media to expand our horizon or are we overusing it and unknowingly desensitizing ourselves. Faboo explores this aspect of social media and nudges us to think about it through this story of a mother and son.

programme.title: Perks Of Being An Actor
programme.desc: A relentless pursuit of an aging actor to become a HERO and how these struggles land him in awkward situations.

programme.title: Expectations
programme.desc: The story is about a boy grappling with overwhelming feelings and contemplating drastic measures. This growing issue among the younger generation stems from unfulfilled expectations placed by society. 'Expectations' is a short film exploring the theme of emotional struggles and their severe consequences.

programme.title: Desh Ki Pardesh ?
programme.desc: The film follows the Parikh's on their visit to their children settled in the US. However, to only realize that there's a lot more than just a generation gap between them. Mainly, dawning upon Hasmuk Parikh's that it's great to dream big for your children, but one must be mentally prepared that those dreams may or not have them in it.

programme.title: Date Night
programme.desc: A meticulously planned date night goes terribly wrong when the husband reveals that he will not be able to make it.

programme.title: Cycle Of Sorrows
programme.desc: Set in a rural village, this heart-wrenching story follows a poor father with a beloved daughter, who still yearns for a son as his pregnant wife prepares to give birth. Driven by financial hardship, he makes a tragic decision that not only shatters his family but leaves his relationship with his daughter and wife forever scarred. Watch this emotional tale of a father’s regret and the lasting impact on his family. Can he undo the damage he’s caused?

programme.title: Dum Dum Deega Deega
programme.desc: The solution to your problem is often hidden in the problem itself; all you need is a different outlook. The story of a beggar child, Ajju, who lives on the streets of Mumbai, but dreams big. He challenges his unfortunate fate, with nothing but a 'different outlook' towards the situation he faces.

programme.title: Gunjaaish
programme.desc: A heartfelt journey of a couple raising a child with autism, discovering the power of love, resilience, and community. Featuring autistic actors, this ground breaking film celebrates acceptance and the beauty of being different.

programme.title: Foul
programme.desc: Against the setting of a journey to Thailand, Ayush, a lustful businessman, possesses both the capability and cleverness to be unfaithful to his wife and shatter her aspirations of moving to Canada. Yet, the question remains: Can he thwart her pursuit of realizing her dreams?

programme.title: Didi!
programme.desc: Imagine waking up to an annoying alarm sound. Familiar? Now imagine waking up to someone else's alarm! Why isn't anyone shutting it? Find out what happens when an annoyed brother wakes up to his sister's loud alarm and storms to her room only to find it empty.

programme.title: Firki
programme.desc: It's the way many father's typically behave when their children start driving. The idea of using the navigation tool to highlight the generation gap is also based on my own life experience. The title is Firki because the family is spinning around like a Firki without having reached their destination in the film. It's also depicts how they've been taken for a ride by the navigation app, or as we say in Hindi....Firki le li

programme.title: Faith
programme.desc: This Young Couple is Super Excited as they just got the permission to go on a night out together but things take an unexpected turn as they get abducted in the middle of the night. The Goons are Brutal on them and it seems that there is no way out until the protagonist thinks of a supernatural idea.

programme.title: Dhongbaaz
programme.desc: Upon learning about his bride's unfaithfulness, an anguished groom delves into her past to uncover the truth, all while the wedding guests impatiently await his return.

programme.title: The Catcher Was A Spy
programme.desc: With an ensemble cast, this gripping, espionage thriller brings to life the true story of Moe Berg a World War II spy. His mission: go behind enemy lines in Europe to assassinate the Nazi's chief nuclear scientist before the Germans develop an atomic bomb. Berg must rely on his steel-trap intellect in a high-stakes game of cat and mouse - with the fate of the world hanging in the balance.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: We control the fear, you understand? Without the fear, we are all good as dead.’ The notorious gangster Al Capone observed that “Prohibition has made nothing but trouble,” and “I am like any other man. All I do is supply a demand.” Acclaimed director delivers a thrillingly vivid slice of American outlaw history in his epic gangster tale, LAWLESS. LAWLESS is the true story of the infamous Bondurant Brothers: three bootlegging siblings who made a run for the American Dream in Prohibition-era Virginia. The film gathers an ensemble of gifted, dynamic new-generation stars – Tom Hardy, Shia LaBeouf, Jessica Chastain, Jason Clarke, Mia Wasikowska, Dane DeHaan – alongside two of the finest actors of their generations, Guy Pearce and Gary Oldman. A riveting, intense story of Crime and Corruption, Loyalty and Love, Brutality and Tenderness, LAWLESS is a rich addition to the American Gangster Canon.

programme.title: Wrecker
programme.desc: Two beautiful young women taking a trip through the countryside, are terrorized by an unknown driver trying to run them down in a heavy duty tow truck.

programme.title: Redline
programme.desc: Redline is an auto/action thriller that features an extensive exotic car collection Phantom Rolls Royce, Lamborghini Murcielago, Enzo Ferrari, Ferrari F430, Ferrari Scaglietti and two Mercedes SLR McLaren AMGs. The film follows a gorgeous young automobile fanaticize driver who becomes part of illegal drag racing competitions organized by exotic car fanatics.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: Regeneration
programme.desc: Terrorists kidnap the Russian Prime Minister's two kids, take Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant and threaten to blow up a reactor. Four Universal Soldiers go in but are no match to a Next Generation UniSol. The world's only hope is to reactivate decommissioned Universal Soldier Luc Deveraux.

programme.title: Haywire
programme.desc: From Academy Award-winning director Steven Soderbergh of Ocean’s 11, 12 & 13 comes HAYWIRE. A Female Assassin covert operative is hired to various global missions to perform jobs which governments can't authorize. When the operation goes awry, she needs to use all of her skills & tricks to escape an international manhunt and eliminate the last remaining link of the conspiracy against her.

programme.title: Poseidon Rex
programme.desc: While searching for lost treasure, deep sea divers unleash a monster that causes havoc and destruction not only in sea but also on land.

programme.title: Spytime
programme.desc: Anacleto, a former secret agent, is forced to come out of retirement and protect his son, Adolfo, when his arch-enemy, Vazquez, breaks out of prison and targets him

programme.title: Tekken: Kazuya's Revenge
programme.desc: Suffering from amnesia, a young man trying to discover his true identity is kidnapped by an underground crime organization and turned into a ruthless assassin

programme.title: Out Of Death
programme.desc: From the producers of The Irishman & Lone Survivor comes this thrilling story of Jack Harris (Bruce Willis) who must tap into his killer instincts to survive the wilderness and the human predators as he tries to help a woman who witnesses a crime and finds herself running from a rural mountain town's corrupt police department after she took a video of police killing a drug dealer.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: Day Of Reckoning
programme.desc: John awakens from a coma to discover his wife and daughter were murdered in a brutal home invasion. Haunted by images of the attack, he vows to kill the man responsible: The fight pits John against Andrew Scott and an army of genetically enhanced warriors; meanwhile, he must contend with a Uni Sol in relentless pursuit.

programme.title: Untraceable
programme.desc: A FBI secret service agent, gets caught in a deadly cat-and-mouse game with a serial killer who knows that people will log onto an "untraceable" website where he conducts violent and painful murders LIVE on the net. The more people who log on and enter the website, the quicker and more violently the victim dies.

programme.desc: Deep in the ice of the antarctic, a team of geologists uncover an old Nazi warship still intact where dark experiments had occurred. In order to conquer the world, the Nazis created rocket-powered sharks whose pilots are genetically mutated, super soldiers with supernatural powers who were able to fly & destroy

programme.title: Jurassic Hunt
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding Creature thriller, Female adventurer Parker joins a crew of male trophy hunters in a remote wilderness park. Their goal: slaughter genetically recreated dinosaurs & must work together to evade the giant human-hungry creatures and mercenaries hired to finish them off. This battle's about to become primitive.

programme.title: Aileen Wuornos: American Boogeywoman
programme.desc: True Story that follows America’s most notorious Female Serial killer. Based on Aileen Wuorno’s early life. Back in 1976 a young Aileen arrives in Florida searching for a new life, marries a wealthy yacht club president to start as part of Florida’s high society. Tormented by her inner demons she surrenders to her murderous impulses havoc in the peaceful community.

programme.title: Out Of Death

programme.title: Ted Bundy: American Boogeyman
programme.desc: This is the true story behind the manhunt that brought America’s most fearsome boogeyman to justice. His name is Ted Bundy. A specter roams the highways of the gritty 1970s America hunting for his next prey. Tracking him are intrepid FBI female agent Kathleen & Robert Ressler organizers of the largest manhunt in history to apprehend America’s most Notorious infamous serial killer.

programme.title: Jurassic Attack
programme.desc: A group of soldiers attempting to rescue a hostage from a terrorist crash land into unfamiliar jungles which are inhabited by a group of long hidden dinosaurs. Now they must find a way out of this isolated valley before becoming prey for prehistoric predators.

programme.title: Vivarium
programme.desc: A Young couple thinking about buying their perfect single family starter home. They visits a real estate agency where they are received by a strange sales agent and find themselves trapped in a surreal, mysterious, maze-like nightmare.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers 2
programme.desc: Every 23rd spring for 23days, it gets to eat…Stranded on a lonely road, a school bus full of high school players must defend themselves from the Creeper, the winged, flesh-eating terror - ancient beast that resurfaces on the earth every 23 years to feed.

Their goal: slaughter genetically recreated dinosaurs & must work together to evade the giant human-hungry creatures and mercenaries hired to finish them off. This battle's about to become primitive.

programme.title: Dil Ka Rishta
programme.desc: Jai accidentally kills his lover's husband. When she gets amnesia, he comforts her, she falls for him. Guilt-ridden, he faces a dilemma: confess or reciprocate?

programme.title: Lootere
programme.desc: Poetic Rajesh, apolitical, lives with his brother Brijesh, a freedom fighter. Brijesh is killed, spurring Rajesh to avenge him, abandoning love Kamini. Kamini marries Rajesh's friend Dheeraj. Dheeraj learns of their past.

programme.title: Waqt Hamara Hai
programme.desc: Miserly industrialist Dhaniram is at odds with sons who want easy access to his riches. They plot to entrap him, but his foster son aids him. Dhaniram's sons aren't his only enemies.

programme.title: Maine Dil Tujhko Diya
programme.desc: College stud Ajay falls for business tycoon Ayesha. Her father opposes, influenced by a rival who plots Ajay's death. Ajay accepts a challenge to find Ayesha, unaware of a deeper conspiracy.

programme.title: Humko Tumse Pyaar Hai
programme.desc: A blind girl loses her lover after regaining sight. She meets & accepts a new man, but her former lover then returns.

programme.title: Jab Pyaar Kisise Hota Hai
programme.desc: An obedient middle-class boy is torn between rock music and his mother's dream of studying abroad. A truth about his dead father jeopardizes his life.

programme.title: Love Love Love
programme.desc: Vijay and Laxmi live happily with Vijay's stepbrother Ravi and his wife Lalita. Property issues and misunderstandings soon threaten to separate them all.

programme.title: Mohabbat
programme.desc: Shekhar loves Pooja, but his stepmother's dowry demand causes Choudhury to reject the marriage. Shekhar leaves home to convince Choudhury to reconsider.

programme.title: Saath Saath
programme.desc: Avinash, a publisher, doesn't chase riches. But his wife's pregnancy brings financial strain, drifting him from his values.

programme.title: Doli Saja Ke Rakhna
programme.desc: A comatose grandmother wakes, forcing her divorcing parents to revive their marriage and recreate the late 1980s to avoid shocking her with the present world.

We bring you a never seen before side of music making with the one and only Manoj Muntashir.

programme.title: Beauty And The Beast
programme.desc: This timeless tale was originally written in 1757. Could Beauty ever love the ghastly lord, the Beast? The year is 1810. After losing his fortune at sea, a bankrupt merchant poor father-of-six, after plucking a scented rose from the repulsive master's garden must do the impossible, permit his daughter Beauty, to take his place and pay for the parent’s sins. Only true love can break the spell.

programme.title: Death Of Me
programme.desc: A vacationing couple on an island off the coast of Thailand with no memory of the previous night must discover the mystery behind a strange video that shows one of them killing the other. In a web of mystery, black magic, and murder they must attempt to reconstruct the night's events & discover is she to blame for not being sacrificed or was it Mother Nature?

programme.title: The Good Boss
programme.desc: What makes a Good Boss? Is your boss good? Manipulative? Shamelessly meddles in his employees private lives? Crosses every line imaginable. The Good Boss is a biting character study with academy award winner Javier Bardem. To win the competition, the manipulative "good boss" unknowingly starts an explosive chain reaction with wild consequences.

programme.title: Untraceable
programme.desc: A FBI secret service agent, gets caught in a deadly cat-and-mouse game with a serial killer who knows that people will log onto an "untraceable" website where he conducts violent and painful murders LIVE on the net. The more people who log on and enter the website, the quicker and more violently the victim dies.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: Regeneration
programme.desc: Terrorists kidnap the Russian Prime Minister's two kids, take Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant and threaten to blow up a reactor. Four Universal Soldiers go in but are no match to a Next Generation UniSol. The world's only hope is to reactivate decommissioned Universal Soldier Luc Deveraux.

programme.title: The Catcher Was A Spy
programme.desc: With an ensemble cast, this gripping, espionage thriller brings to life the true story of Moe Berg a World War II spy. His mission: go behind enemy lines in Europe to assassinate the Nazi's chief nuclear scientist before the Germans develop an atomic bomb. Berg must rely on his steel-trap intellect in a high-stakes game of cat and mouse - with the fate of the world hanging in the balance.

programme.title: Jurassic Hunt
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding Creature thriller, Female adventurer Parker joins a crew of male trophy hunters in a remote wilderness park. Their goal: slaughter genetically recreated dinosaurs & must work together to evade the giant human-hungry creatures and mercenaries hired to finish them off. This battle's about to become primitive.

programme.title: Redline
programme.desc: Redline is an auto/action thriller that features an extensive exotic car collection Phantom Rolls Royce, Lamborghini Murcielago, Enzo Ferrari, Ferrari F430, Ferrari Scaglietti and two Mercedes SLR McLaren AMGs. The film follows a gorgeous young automobile fanaticize driver who becomes part of illegal drag racing competitions organized by exotic car fanatics.

programme.desc: What makes a Good Boss? Is your boss good? Manipulative? Shamelessly meddles in his employees private lives? Crosses every line imaginable. The Good Boss is a biting character study with academy award winner Javier Bardem. To win the competition, the manipulative "good boss" unknowingly starts an explosive chain reaction with wild consequences.
